name: LD47 - The Flying Tree
description:
Do not forget to follow us.

Controls: Left/Right arrows

Ludum Dare 47 game.

Vote here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/the-flying-tree

Stuck in a loop.

You use thermal wind to fly with a mountain maple seed. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Acer_pseudoplatanus

 Find dirt to grow a tree. You stucked in a loop thanks to mankind.

Inspired by paragliding and inktober.  :)

Credits:

  • David Peter (Art, Design, Coding)
  • Sztrovacsek (Coding) https://sztrovacsek.itch.io/
  • Music: Unknown royalty free music from Youtube. (Let me know if you know the source)
